title: Bloomberg Markets: Lu Says U.S. Wage Growth `Troubling'
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Lu Says U.S. Wage Growth `Troubling'
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Chris Lu Senior Fellow University of Virginia Miller Center Former Deputy Secretary of Labor US Department of Labor Discussing breakdown of June jobs report and disappointing wage gains.
